pages.text: $(4)$(bold)Curse of Binding$()$() prevents you from $(important)removing or dropping$() the item once held!$(br2)$(c)WARNING:$() This is a $(important)curse$(). Do NOT apply unless you're absolutely sure!

pages.title: A Curse
pages.text: This effect is $(c)intentionally difficult to obtain$().$(br2)You must specifically create it - it won't happen by accident.

pages.title: Effects
pages.text: $(li)Cannot drop the item$(li)Cannot remove from inventory$(li)Cannot place in chests$(li)Stays until death (without Soulbound)$(br2)$(important)This is permanent$() until you die or use special removal methods!

pages.title: Why Would You...?
pages.text: Legitimate uses:$(li)Pranking friends (evil)$(li)Challenge runs$(li)Roleplay/adventure maps$(li)Preventing accidental drops$(br2)$(c)Think twice before cursing an item!$()$(br2)$(o)Some bindings cannot be broken...$()
